body.name: Ursa Major Fantastic Face Wash | Natural, Vegan & Cruelty Free | Daily Foaming Facial Cleanser for Men & Women | 8 ounces
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Tomorrow, February 16. Order within 7 hrs 15 mins
features: URSA MAJOR FANTASTIC FACE WASH - This natural facial cleanser delivers a thorough and invigorating cleanse, plus a hit of AHA exfoliation, without stripping your skin of moisture or messing with its pH balance. Ideal for normal, combination, oily and acne-prone skin.

CLEAN, HEALTHY INGREDIENTS- Our natural, brightening face wash is formulated with naturally-derived ingredients including soothing aloe, brightening sugarcane, moisturizing rice seed and cleansing coconut-derived surfactants.

SULFATE-FREE, PARABEN-FREE, CRUELTY-FREE - Ursa Major's cruelty-free face wash contains no petrochemicals, sulfates, synthetic fragrance or color, glycols, silicones or PEGs. In addition, this natural foaming gel cleanser is non-drying and may help prevent breakouts and acne.

TEXTURE AND AROMA - Fantastic Face Wash is a foaming gel cleanser with a built-in AHA exfoliating complex. The woodsy aroma of our daily face cleanser is a fusion of cedar, spearmint, lime, lemon, rosemary, black spruce, owyhee, vetiver and lavender.

GOOD TO KNOW - This is a natural face wash for men and women and works best for normal, oily, combination and temperamental skin types. It can be used in the morning to start your day, in the evening before bed, or after a workout to deliver clear, healthy-looking skin.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect Face Cleanser! I have HIGH expectations :) L👀king for Clean SkinCare Products!
reviews.reviewText: I love the way this cleanser feels, smells and really works, with a washcloth, to clean my face & remove blackheads & dead-skin-cells & makes my face feel so smooth & clean & it glows, so I actually use it on my whole body! It works better than ANY face-wash, I have ever used! I used to have to use a toner, to finish removing dead skin cells, but this does the job, by itself.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Clean, smells great
reviews.reviewText: The product smells wonderful, and seems to work well. It last a long time as well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 26, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good face wash!!
reviews.reviewText: I always like Ursa Major, and been buying their products when I run out. I bought the deodorant, wipes and tried the samples that came with purchases. This review is about the face wash. I got this mainly for DH. He wants one that is not too much scent, smell nice to him instead of too fruity or flowery, the right texture,easy to use, and I want something that is unisex and non toxic. It's harder to find good green, non-toxic personal care brands for men. There maybe seem like a lot are out there, but it could be green-washing or mainly targeting women folks. So, when he tried the sample and like it, I know I need to get it. Plus, it is good when both of us can use the same thing, less clutter in the bathroom.For me, when I use it, it removes my daily grimes and SPF, feel clean and no dry/tight feeling after wash. You need very little to lather up. This is a pretty big bottle and will last a long time. Overall, I am pleased with this purchase. Oh, Prime free shipping helps.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great Exfoliator—too strong for daily use
reviews.reviewText: This product smells great—mostly like cedar—but it does irritate the eyes just a bit (even when not getting in the eyes). It makes your skin super smooth and clear and clean. It super scrubs. BUT—it’s quite strong and it can make my skin pink. Since it lacks any creamy element, it leaves you rather exposed. HOWEVER—it doesn’t leave residue like creamy soaps do, which I like. Given that, I use this soap once or twice a week. Really get everything down to the bone, and I have a mild creamy face soap for other days.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 2, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My holy grail face wash
reviews.reviewText: This is my favorite face wash that I have ever tried. Removes difficult make-up in one go, doesn't dry my face, has a pleasant smell, and the #1 ingredient is aloe vera. It's pricy, but a little goes a long way. I don't use a ton but it still gets my face very clean. I'm on my 4th bottle of this already!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Refreshing face wash
reviews.reviewText: It has gentle exfoliating along with cleansing

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 14, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I look forward to washing my face because I love this product so much. It was a little on the expensive side for me, but you truly just need the tiniest drop for it still be super sudsy and lathering, so the bottle is going to last a long time. It feels powerful but gentle at the same time, and it smells so good. Please never stop making this product!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not for me
reviews.reviewText: I really wanted to like this product based on the hundreds of positive reviews. It dried my skin too much even after I put on moisturizer. Maybe I wouldn’t mind as much if it weren’t winter, but I’m not a huge fan of the scent either. Returning.

reviews.reviewTitle: If you're thinking about it, try it! Lasts forever
reviews.reviewText: Before buying this product, I was never the type of guy to care much about skin care. Never really (thought I) had to. Used dove soap for whole body, including face. Started to notice my skin drying out significantly around my cheeks, tip of nose, and under facial hair.Found this product mentioned on a few reviews online, and since I started using this face wash, I haven't had a problem with dry skin at all. Great, slightly citric smell, and very little is required to clean my face. Doesn't lather as much as I expected, but it works well and has kept my skin clean and blemish free, without drying out my face. I've had the same bottle for a couple of years now, and still have about a quarter left! Great purchase, and when I run low I'll be ordering more
Awesome product but slightly dry the skin comfortable for all seasons except winter , it restores skin Normal conditions from acne.
I love this stuff .. it’s so nice on the skin ...
This product is so much more than a face wash to me. I also dilute it and put it into the hand soap pump. It does an amazing job of removing garden grime and other extreme dirt. Love it! Love it!
This is just such an amazing cleanser....I keep going back to it. My skin just loves it!! Smell is great, just enough lather and not to drying.
